column1: Little Goat Diner////2.  Korean Burger - sides ala carte.  My wife ordered a Mac & Cheese side. She enjoyed the burger
column2: which she said was way too much food and the Kimchi too bland.  She also liked the Mac & Cheese
column3: but observed that the portion was shareable.  That said
column4: my wife said she preferred the burgers at The Burger Bar or the Lockdown Bar and Grill (Kuma's Corner
